text:
(ENCHANTER) "Our mistress, Echidna, is the main occupant. She may prevail upon you to part with some of your lifeblood. This is not wholly bad, but if you have any octagonal glass prisms then you'd be better off fighting her."

You sense the Enhralment weakening. The hag is coming round, and will doubless give high priority to some scheme for revenge against you. To forestall this, you strike her senseless with an iron ladle taken out of her own cauldron. Doubless she has in her time visited far worse fates on others.
